name: SUPER SMASH FROGS
description:
SUPER SMASH FROGS  

is an indie game combination of counter strike 1.6 && smash bros  gameplay with frogs characters in 2D style to make the game fun and enjoyable, this game is friendly mobile so you can play this game on your mobile, but don't forget to check the mobile input before playing, I hope you support us  so we can make the game better in the updates, hit comment and like if you like thanks <3
